name: NEHotspotHelper
desc: A class to register a hotspot helper.

items.name: class func register(options: [String : NSObject]?, queue: DispatchQueue, handler: NEHotspotHelperHandler) -> Bool
items.desc: Register the application as a Hotspot Helper.

items.name: let kNEHotspotHelperOptionDisplayName: String
items.desc: The string displayed in Wi-Fi Settings for a network handled by the application.

items.name: typealias NEHotspotHelperHandler
items.desc: The type definition for the Hotspot Helper's command handler block.

items.name: class func supportedNetworkInterfaces() -> [Any]?
items.desc: Return the list of network interfaces managed by the Hotspot Helper infrastructure.

items.name: class func logoff(NEHotspotNetwork) -> Bool
items.desc: Terminate the authentication session for a Hotspot network.
